questions.question: Euler's method 2nd order is used to solve _______________________
The formulation used in Euler's method 2nd order is

answers.a: $$ y_2 = y_1-hf(x_1, y_1, z_1) \ \ \ \ \ z_2 = z_1-hg(x_1, y_1, z_1) $$
answers.b: $$ y_2 = y_1+hf(x_1, y_1, z_1) \ \ \ \ \ z_2 = z_1+hg(x_1, y_1, z_1) $$
answers.c: $$ y_2 = hf(x_1, y_1, z_1) \ \ \ \ \ z_2 = hg(x_1, y_1, z_1) $$
answers.d: $$ y_2 = f(x_1, y_1, z_1) \ \ \ \ \ z_2 = g(x_1, y_1, z_1) $$
